articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Trump’s new travel ban takes effect as tensions escalate over immigration enforcement - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s new ban on travel to the US by citizens from 12 mainly African and Middle Eastern countries took effect Monday amid rising tension over the president’s escalating campaign of immigration enforcement.
